trans-unit.target: TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_SEQ_00<tab>Yaana's excitement is palpable.

TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_SEQ_01<tab>Yaana presents your next opponent, the Brute Bomber, who is the champion of the light-heavyweight division. She warns you that he utilizes the power of the bomb king, and will attempt to seize victory by whatever means necessary. Nevertheless, she is confident you will not succumb to his unscrupulous methods, and so you prepare yourself for what is sure to be your most heated battle yet.
※AAC Light-heavyweight M3 can be accessed via the Duty Finder.

TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_SEQ_02<tab>After evading countless lariats and explosions, the Brute Bomber's flame has finally been extinguished by your hand. Yaana will wish to congratulate you on your victory.
※In the event that you leave the area, you may return by speaking with the Arcadion attendant in front of the Arcadion.

TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_SEQ_03<tab>Yaana is thrilled by your achievement, and remains thoroughly impressed of all you have accomplished without a regulator. Since you have now earned the title of champion of the light-heavyweight tier, Yaana bids you prepare for your crowning ceremony. Once you have readied yourself, she will escort you to the stage.

TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_SEQ_04<tab>The Brute Bomber interrupts what should have been a joyous event, upset that he failed to seize victory in your bout. He attempts to tackle you, when lightning strikes the pyromaniac from above. The lights in the stadium suddenly go out, only to return moments later with none other than Yaana's sister, Eutrope─otherwise known as Wicked Thunder─standing in the ring. She threatens to take your soul, which Metem construes as a challenge. He has not the authority to permit such a duel however, as the neoteric witch's license was revoked after her disappearance. Conveniently, the Ascension Arcadia President's voice suddenly reverberates over the stadium to sanction this clash, and so your next foe is decided. Yet Yaana appears to feel conflicted about this turn of events...
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_TODO_00<tab>Clear AAC Light-heavyweight M3.
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Yaana.
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Yaana again.
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_100_000<tab>If you win this next fight, you'll become champion of the light-heavyweight division! Let's give it everything we've got!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_100<tab>Right, let's take a look at your opponent.
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_101<tab>That there, I regret to say, is the reigning light-heavyweight champion, Brute Bomber.
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_102<tab>He uses the might of the bomb king to ignite all that he touches. But that'll be the least of your worries.
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_103<tab>He's a dirty fighter who'll do anything and everything to win, the rules be damned. Countless of his opponents have had to be carried to the infirmary.
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_104<tab>But you'll be fine, I'm sure of it! If you bested me, you can best the Brute Bomber too!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_105<tab>Now go and blast that loathsome lout out of his own ring, and come back here the new champion!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_110<tab>I believe in you, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Blast the Brute Bomber out of his own ring and become champion!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_120<tab>You did it! You really did it! Even though you beat me, I'm absolutely over the moon for you!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_121<tab>It's truly astonishing what you can do without a feral soul...
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_122<tab>With this, you're now the light-heavyweight champion! Congratulations, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_123<tab>Now, there's going to be a ceremony to officially crown you champion. All and sundry will be watching, so make sure you wear something you won't regret!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_130<tab>Ready, are you? Then let's get you on stage for your big moment!

TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_000870_METEM_000_200<tab>My fellow citizens! We are gathered to recognize a new champion in the Arcadion─a rising star who shot to the top of the light-heavyweight division at breakneck speed!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_METEM_000_201<tab>Without further ado, please give a warm welcome to the <var 08 E905 ((woman)) ((man)) /var> of the hour!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_METEM_000_202<tab>The unstoppable upstart, the unenhanced-but-unbeatable, the one and only <var 29 EB02 /var>!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_BRUTEBOMBER_000_203<tab>Hold it right there!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_BRUTEBOMBER_000_204<tab>Your victory was a farce, and I refuse to accept it!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_METEM_000_205<tab>Oh my! It appears Brute Bomber is unsatisfied with the outcome of his match!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_BRUTEBOMBER_000_206<tab>You fought with eight of you! How is that fair!? Let's settle this one-on-one, just you and me!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_207<tab>You're one to talk about fair! If it's supposed to be a one-on-one, fight without your bloody bomb king!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_BRUTEBOMBER_000_208<tab>Shut your mouths! I make the rules here!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_METEM_000_209<tab>What in the world just happened!?
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_YAANA_000_210<tab>Eutrope!?
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_METEM_000_211<tab>I-I don't believe it! Wicked Thunder, the heavyweight fighter who suddenly vanished, has returned!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_EUTROPE_000_212<tab>I will have your soul! Prepare yourself!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_METEM_000_213<tab>What's this!? Wicked Thunder has just challenged the unstoppable upstart!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_METEM_000_214<tab>Alas, as much as I wish to bear witness to their clash, Wicked Thunder's license was revoked upon her disappearance. I am unable to sanction such a match...
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_ARCADIAOWNER_000_215<tab>(-Reverberating Voice-)Intriguing... Most intriguing...
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_METEM_000_216<tab>Th-This voice! It's the president!
TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_ARCADIAOWNER_000_217<tab>(-Ascension Arcadia President-)I will allow a special exhibition match. Prepare Wicked Thunder's ring...and prepare yourself, upstart.

TEXT_KINGRA105_04964_METEM_000_218<tab>You heard it, folks! By permission of the president, a match will be held! Who will emerge the victor: neoteric witch or the unenhanced warrior!? This is an event you cannot afford to miss!
